name: Oh Shoot (emptyezio22)
description:
w a s d - move

left click - shoot

2 shots to kill aliens 

4 shots to kill robots

blue ammo boxes give 25 bullets

red hearts heal you one heart if you are not full health

!!!BULLETS BOUNCE!!! so missing a shot  may have it come back at you so watch out

killing aliens or robots gives you one point

alt-f4 to leave
